name: Badge, Gold
label: Great Question
description: Gold badge achievement that a user earns within a community.

name: Badge, Silver
label: Favorite Question
description: Silver badge achievement that a user earns within a community.

name: Badge, Bronze
label: Altruist
description: Bronze badge achievement that a user earns within a community.

name: Number Count, Gold
description: Badge which displays the total number of gold badges a user has earned.

name: Number Count, Silver
description: Badge which displays the total number of silver badges a user has earned.

name: Number Count, Bronze
description: Badge which displays the total number of bronze badges a user has earned.

name: Bounty
description: Badge which notes that a user has offered a reward for an answer to their question.

name: Post Votes
description: Badge which notes the total number of votes (upvotes minus downvotes) a user's post has earned.

name: Accepted Answer
description: Badge which notes the total number of votes (upvotes minus downvotes) a user's post has earned and signifies that their post was the accepted answer.

name: Reputation Increase
description: Badge which notes reputation points earned.

name: Reputation Decrease
description: Badge which notes reputation points taken away.

name: Badge, Extra small
description: Decreases the badge size even further.
